message: The parameter 'ApiVersionParameter' is defined in global parameters section without 'x-ms-parameter-location' extension. This would add the parameter as the client property. Please ensure that this is exactly you want. If so, apply the extension "x-ms-parameter-location": "client". Else, apply the extension "x-ms-parameter-location": "method".
